title: BigFish Games - John and Mary's Memories - New Card Game - Wend
description:
John and Mary's Memories - 45.24 MB



Join John and Mary as they travel around the entire world solving exciting levels by matching 
souvenir cards. This Memory game lets you learn fun facts about each of the cities you visit, 
collect tons of knick-knacks, and send postcards to all of your friends and family back in 
America! Use your memory as best you can to progress through their travels. Will you be able to 
unlock them all and learn all about John and MaryÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Memories?
